quote.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

about.head: Who am I
description: Computers and tech has been one of my interests since I was about 11years old.
However the last 4-5years ive focused more and more of my time on this interest, because I want to do this for a living.
My passion is both whats going on in the background, and what the costumer sees.

facts.title: fun-facts
list: I like summer more than i like winter
I can fix my own car
I like sushi and pizza, but not at the same time ;)

Dr_who.text: With great power comes great electricity bill

Wayne_Dyer.text: If you believe it will work, you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't, you will see obstacles.
Wayne_Dyer.author: Wayne Dyer

Theodore_Roosevelt.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

Abdul_Kalam.text: If you fail, never give up because F.A.I.L. means ‘first attempt in learning’; End is not the end, in fact, E.N.D. means “Effort Never Dies’…

Albert_Einstein.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

Audrey_Hepburn.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says "I’m possible!"

Albert_Einstein2.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

long_desc.heading: Background
long_desc.content: This is my first portfolio project, undertaken with little prior experience.

long_desc.heading: Inspiration
long_desc.content: The design is heavily inspired by eliasdevis.github.io.

long_desc.heading: Version
long_desc.content: This is the second version, it is completely rewritten in React for improved performance and maintainability.

learned.heading: Challenges
learned.content: Converting from HTML to React required a significant shift in mindset, I also chose to go with regular css instead of sass, which it originally was written in

learned.heading: Key Takeaways
learned.content: I learned about component structure, data flow, and the importance of planning, using react also helped me in understanding to work component by component

missed.heading: Testing
missed.content: I often worte too big chuncks of code, before testing, just to find out that something wasnt working

missed.heading: Responsive Design
missed.content: More attention should have been paid to responsive design during the process to ensure compatibility across devices.

why.heading: Purpose
why.content: To create a professional online presence showcasing my skills and projects while expanding my skillset, and push myself to learn more

why.heading: Learning Goals
why.content: To gain practical experience with React development and deployment.

projectsExpanded.name: next_planets
projectsExpanded.description: Using internal database and display data in next.js

long_desc.heading: Background
long_desc.content: First project with next.js, the task was to render dynamic data from an imaginary database

long_desc.heading: Inspiration
long_desc.content: All the objects in this assignment is pure fantasy

long_desc.heading: Version
long_desc.content: This is the final version of this project

learned.heading: Challenges
learned.content: Know when to stop, my fantasy projects has a tendency to go waaay out of hand, other challenges was to render the data as I wanted

learned.heading: Key Takeaways
learned.content: For me this project was time sensetive, I wanted to make something I could stand by, I could have done It more easy, but for me its important to learn, not just taking the easy way

missed.heading: Time
missed.content: I would have liked to have more time on this project, yet i feel like I completed the task

why.heading: Purpose
why.content: This project was about getting to know next.js, to see how it can be used, and how it can get information from an external database

why.heading: Learning Goals
why.content: To gain practical experience with next.js development and deployment.

projectsExpanded.name: Companyinformation
projectsExpanded.description: Group project, use API to find company information

long_desc.heading: Background
long_desc.content: This was the first group-assignment, we where supposed to work together in React

long_desc.heading: Version
long_desc.content: This is the last version, and the final version

learned.heading: Challenges
learned.content: This project was supposed to be a 2 person group task, I ended up doing it alone, because the other person of the team didnt meet up, I still tried to simulate being in a team, working with branches, etc

learned.heading: Key Takeaways
learned.content: I liked this project, it was enjoyable to make the data render, and to get the search function to work as intended

missed.heading: Testing
missed.content: I went through a lot of testing, and at one point I found that the search function didnt work as intended

missed.heading: Responsive Design
missed.content: I have not implented responsive design on this project

why.heading: Purpose
why.content: The purpose of this project was to work together in a team, that didnt work out, but I did the best I could, and I used people around me to ask for things, and to get input on my solutions

why.heading: Learning Goals
why.content: To gain practical experience with React development and deployment, and to learn how to work in team
